application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The details submitted do not fully satisfy the requirements of condition 8 of planning permission 21/01831/FUL as they do not demonstrate that the internal water usage rates are no greater than 105L per person per day as required by the condition.
description: Details required for Condition 8 (CO2 Emissions) of planning permission 21/01831/FUL (Partial demolition of 27 Victoria Road and redevelopment to provide a part single storey, part three storey rear extension, including mansard roof and roof terrace, to provide office (Class E) at ground floor including residential entrance and residential use(Class C3) comprising 8 no.x residential units at upper levels and alterations to existing facade of the building together with associated works.)
